title: WeaponVerse1 SFX9173
description: Spatialized professional gun sound effects. 'WeaponVerse1 SFX9173'
longDescription:
🔗YoutubeDemo.

AR 5M~300M Fires / DMR&SR 5M~300M Fires / SMG&Pistol 5M~300M Fires / MG 5M~300M Fires / SG 5M~300M Fires

WeaponVerse1 - Reload&Fires Dryshots



📖Overview.

This sound effects set contains gun sound effects that can be used in various fields such as games, movies, and animations. The set includes a variety of sounds such as gun shots, gun shots with silencers, the removal and insertion of the magazine, the retreat and advance of the bolt, the sound of picking up a gun, the sound of dropping a gun, the sound of bullets passing by, etc. In addition, for sniper rifles, the sound that can be heard depending on the situation, such as the rapid retreat and advance of the bolt and the stop due to the player's mistake, is also included. In the case of machine guns, the sound of opening and closing the cover is also included.


The most important thing is that we provide a variety of outdoor field sounds in steps, from 5 meters to 300 meters, and up to 1 km, so that the gunshot can sound differently depending on the distance between the players when the gun is fired. In addition, we provide indoor sounds in 6 different types of sizes, from 5 meters to 100 meters, so you can create sound in a variety of environments such as small rooms or bathrooms, small theaters, large theaters, and factories.


The set contains a total of 64 types of guns. The types of guns include rifles (AR), designated marksman rifles (DMR), submachine guns (SMG), pistols (PS), machine guns (MG), sniper rifles (SR), and grenade launchers (GL).


This sound effects set is high-quality sound effects produced by professional sound engineers. The effects are provided with high-quality effects by experts who directly carry out all processes such as recording, editing, mixing, and mastering. I hope this sound effects set will be helpful in your work.



🕹️Functionality.

  • 7 types of guns, including AR, DMR, SMG, MG, SR, PS, and GL, are provided.
  • Stepped gun firing sounds from 5M to 300M in outdoor are provided.
  • Stepped gun firing sounds from 5M to 100M in indoor are provided in 6 room types.
  • The sound of separating and connecting the magazine and the sound of the bolt retracting and advancing are provided.
  • In addition, the sniper rifle provides fast loading, slow loading, and loading stop sounds, and the machine gun provides a separate sound of the cover.
  • The sound of picking up a gun (Draw) and dropping a gun (Drop) is provided.
  • The sound of a bullet brushing past the air (sonic boom) is provided. It can also be used as a rebound sound.
  • A 'Attenuations' setting file is provided for each distance.



📂FILES.

  • Attenuations
  • Field 4
  • Bolts
  • BoltBack 1140 (Dry, Room)
  • BoltRelease 1292 (Dry, Room)
  • Covers
  • Close 95 (Dry, Room)
  • Open 95 (Dry, Room)
  • Draws 1140 (Dry, Room)
  • Drop 228 (Dry, Room)
  • Fires 1856 (Dry, Field, Room)
  • Fires_Silencer 1645 (Dry, Field, Room)
  • Magazines
  • Magazine_In 1140 (Dry, Field, Room)
  • Magazine_Out 1083 (Dry, Field, Room)
  • Service
  • Bullet_SonicBoom 6



⭐5STAR Review.

  • If you like the product, please leave a 5-star review! We always have a great communication with our customers. :D
  • Even if you don't have the sound you want, please leave a 5-star review and feedback! We will check the customer's review every two weeks and fill in the sound as possible every two weeks! We will also give you a relevant reply if your opinion is reflected :D
